result.eng: He arrived with a book under his arm.
result.ga: Tháinig sé agus leabhar faoina ascaill aige
result.orig: Tháinig sé agus leabhar faoina ascaill aige
result.html: Tháinig sé agus leabhar faoina ascaill aigeHe arrived with a book under his arm.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé agus leaḃar faoina ascaill aigeHe arrived with a book under his arm.

result.eng: There were dark hollows underneath his eyes.
result.html: Bhí loig dhorcha faoina shúileThere were dark hollows underneath his eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí loig ḋorċa faoina ẛúileThere were dark hollows underneath his eyes.
